title: Oxygen Graphics
description: I joined Oxygen Graphics immediately after finishing my degree and took on a role of Web Developer. I mainly worked with WordPress to design, build and maintain websites for external clients. My biggest achievement during that time was building a new company website which used a more user friendly and responsive design.

title: F1 Tracks App
description: At the start of 2021, I began learning TypeScript as I wanted to start building projects with the latest versions of modern front end frameworks. I used a google API and historical data from Formula 1 to put together a map overlayed with pins showing each F1 track from a given year as well as standings table.

title: Prezzybox.com
description: I was part of Prezzybox tech team from 2019 to 2021. During that time I was involved in developing many user facing features such as revamp of their mobile navigation or imporovement of product personalisation features. Additionally I worked on myQdos which is a HR platform owned by Prezzybox. It allows managing employee leave, incentivising staff and monitoring individual targets.

title: Angular 2+ To Do App
description: At the begining of 2021 I started spending more time trying to learn and master the latest version of Angular framework. This is a basic 'To-Do' app which demonstrates CRUD operations using Angular 10 as well as understanding of backend using NodeJS. The plan is to extend this app with Angular Materials to make it look and feel more modern.
